directions: Combine potato nuggets, milk, cream of mushroom soup, Cheddar cheese, sour cream, ham, onion, salt, and pepper in a slow cooker.
Cook on High, stirring occasionally, for 4 hours (or on Low for 5 to 7 hours).
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)
1 (10 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Crocked Tater Tot® Soup
